Use our extension to ensure that your baby's development is on track.
Open a new tab and learn about your baby’s development, from milestones to growth, challenges and tips to make life easier.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the PetiTip  Extension Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your New Tab search services provided by Bing

User Terms: https://weave-innovative.com/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://weave-innovative.com/privacypolicy

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
